examples: He is such a curious boy, always asking questions.
Es un chico tan curioso, siempre haciendo preguntas.
They were very curious about the people who lived upstairs.
Sentían mucha curiosidad por las personas que vivían en el piso de arriba.
Everyone was curious as to why Mark was leaving.
Todos tenían curiosidad por saber por qué Mark se iba.
I was curious to find out what she had said.
Tenía curiosidad por saber qué había dicho.
